assessment_item.title: ಇದು ಮುಸೋಲಿಸಿ ಸ್ಥಾಪಿಸಿದ ಪಕ್ಷವಾಗಿದೆ.
assessment_item.body:

ಇದು ಮುಸೋಲಿಸಿ ಸ್ಥಾಪಿಸಿದ ಪಕ್ಷವಾಗಿದೆ.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:9604"},{"text":"

ಡೆಮಾಕ್ರಟಿಕ್ ಪಕ್ಷ
